name: Acid Dwarf
desc: This poor soul was hoping for an alluring tonic to attract a love interest but is now covered in skin-melting acid.

special_abilities.name: Acidic Aura
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that ends their turn within 5 ft. of this creature takes 1d6 acid damage.

actions.name: Touch flesh
actions.desc: The dwarf makes a melee attack against a creature, its acidic fingers clinging to any bare flesh it can find. On a hit, the target takes 4 (1d8) acid damage.
